3  theerkkadharisananj Sollugiravano Manusharukku Bakthiviruththiyum, Puththiyum, Aarudhalum Undaakaththakkadhaagap Pesugiraan.
4  anniyabaashaiyil Pesugiravan Thanakke Pagdthiviruththi Undaagap Pesugiraan; Theerkkadharisanansollugiravano Sabaikku Bagthiviruththi Undaagap Pesugiraan.

5  neengalellaarum Anniyabaashaigalaip Pesumpadi Virumbugiren; Aagilum, Anniyabaashaigalil Pesugiravan Sabaikku Bagthiviruththi Undaagumpadikku Arththaththaiyum Sollaavittaal, Theerkkadharisananj Sollugiravan Avanilum Menmaiyullavan; Aadhalaal Neengal Theerkkadharisanansollugiravargalaagavendumendru Adhigamaai Virumbugiren.

6  melum, Sagodharare, Naan Ungalidaththil Vandhu Ungalukku Ragasiyangalai Velippaduththuvadharkaavadhu, Arivundaakkuvadharkaavadhu, Theerkkadharisanaththai Arivikkiradharkaavadhu, Podhagaththaip Podhikkiradharkaavadhu Edhuvaanadhai Sollaamal, Anniyabaashaigalil Pesinaal Ennaale Ungalukkup Pirayojanam Enna?

7  appadiye Pullaanguzhal, Suramandalam Mudhalaagiya Saththamidugira Uyirillaadha Vaaththiyangal Dhonigalil Viththiyaasam Kaattaavittaal, Kuzhalaale Oodhappadugiradhum, Suramandalaththaale Vaasikkappadugiradhum Innadhendru Eppadith Theriyum?
8  andhappadi Ekkaalamum Vilangaadha Saththamittaal Evan Yuththaththirku Aayaththampannuvaan?
9  adhupola, Neengalum Thelivaana Pechchai Naavinaal Vasaniyaavittaal Pesappattadhu Innadhendru Eppadiththeriyum? Aagaayaththil Pesugiravargalaayiruppeergale.
10  ulagaththile Eththanaiyo Vidhamaanabaashaigal Undaayirukkiradhu, Avaigalil Ondrum Arththamillaadhadhalla.
11  aayinum, Baashaiyin Karuththai Naan Ariyaamalirundhaal, Pesugiravanukku Anniyanaayiruppen, Pesugiravanum Enakku Anniyanaayiruppaan.

13  andhappadi, Anniyabaashaiyil Pesugiravan Adhin Arththaththaiyum Sollaththakkadhaaga Vinnappampannakkadavan.
14  ennaththinaalenil, Naan Anniyabaashaiyile Vinnappampanninaal En Aavi Vinnappampannumeyandri, En Karuththu Bayanatradhaayirukkum.
15  ippadiyirukka Seyyavenduvadhenna? Naan Aaviyodum Vinnappampannuven, Karuththodum Vinnappampannuven; Naan Aaviyodum Paaduven, Karuththodum Paaduven.
16  illaavittaal, Nee Aaviyodu Sthoththirampannumpodhu, Kallaadhavan Un Sthoththiraththirku Aamen Endru Eppadi Solluvaan? Nee Pesugiradhu Innadhendru Avan Ariyaane.
17  nee Nandraai Sthoththiram Pannugiraai, Aagilum Matravan Pagthiviruththiyadaiyamaattaane.
18  ungalellaarilum Naan Adhigamaaip Baashaigalaip Pesugiren, Idharkaaga En Dhevanai Sthoththirikkiren.

19  appadiyirundhum, Naan Sabaiyile Anniyabaashaiyil Padhinaayiram Vaarththaigalaip Pesugiradhilum, Matravargalai Unarththumpadi En Karuththode Aindhu Vaarththaigalaip Pesugiradhe Enakku Adhiga Viruppamaayirukkum.
20  sagodharare, Neengal Puththiyile Kuzhandhaigalaayiraadheyungal; Thurkkunaththile Kuzhandhaigalaayum, Puththiyilo Therinavargalaayumirungal.
21  marubaashaikkaararaalum, Maruudhadugalaalum Indha Janangalidaththil Pesuven; Aagilum Avargal Enakku Sevikoduppadhillaiyendru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Vedhaththil Ezhudhiyirukkiradhe.

22  appadiyirukka, Anniyabaashaigal Visuvaasigalukku Adaiyaalamaayiraamal, Avisuvaasigalukku Adaiyaalamaayirukkiradhu; Theerkkadharisanamo Avisuvaasigalukku Adaiyaalamaayiraamal, Visuvaasigalukku Adaiyaalamaayirukkiradhu.

23  aagaiyaal, Sabaiyaarellaarum Egamaaik Koodivandhu, Ellaarum Anniyabaashaigalile Pesikkollumpodhu, Kallaadhavargalaavadhu, Avisuvaasigalaavadhu Ulle Piravesiththaal, Avargal Ungalaip Paiththiyam Pidiththavargalenpaargalallavaa?
24  ellaarum Theerkkadharisanan Sollugaiyil, Avisuvaasiyoruvan, Alladhu Kallaadhavanoruvan, Ulle Piravesiththaal, Avan Ellaaraalum Unarththuvikkappattum, Ellaaraalum Nidhaanikkappattum Iruppaan.
25  avanudaiya Irudhayaththin Andharangangalum Veliyarangamaagum, Avanmugankuppura Vizhundhu, Dhevanaippanindhukondu, Dhevan Meyyaai Ungalukkulle Irukkiraarendru Arikkaiyiduvaan.

26  neengal Koodivandhirukkirapodhu, Oruvan Sangeedham Paadugiraan, Oruvan Podhagampannugiraan, Oruvan Anniyabaashaiyaip Pesugiraan, Oruvan Iragasiyaththai Velippaduththugiraan, Oruvan Viyaakkiyaanam Pannugiraan. Sagodharare, Idhu Enna? Sagalamum Bakthiviruththikkedhuvaaga Seyyappadakkadavadhu.
27  yaaraavadhu Anniyabaashaiyile Pesugiradhundaanaal, Adhu Irandupermattil, Alladhu Minjinaal Moondrupermattila Adangavum, Avargal Ovvoruvaraaip Pesavum, Oruvan Arththaththai Sollavum Vendum.
28  arththan Sollugiravanillaavittaal, Sabaiyile Pesaamal, Thanakkum Dhevanukkum Theriyap Pesakkadavan.
29  theerkkadharisigal Iranduperaavadhu Moondruperaavadhu Pesalaam, Matravargal Nidhaanikkakkadavargal.
30  ange Utkaarndhirukkira Matroruvanukku Edhaagilum Velippaduththappattaal, Mundhip Pesinavan Pesaamalirukkakkadavan.

36  devavasanam Ungalidaththilirundhaa Purappattadhu? Adhu Ungalidaththukku Maaththiramaa Vandhadhu?

38  oruvan Ariyaadhavanaayirundhaal, Avan Ariyaadhavanaayirukkattum.
39  ippadiyirukka, Sagodharare, Theerkkadharisanansolla Naadungal, Anniya Baashaigalaip Pesugiradharkum Thadaipannaadhirungal.
